short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secure communication for the privacy-minded individual

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows integration with existing messaging services (Facebook complete, Google Hangouts in progress) with an alternate, privacy-focused messaging service (www.locketchat.com). With the extension enabled, users are able to chat on Facebook, Hangouts, or Locket Chat using end-to-end PGP encryption.
